subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Trumaine McBride has played for five teams in six N.F.L. seasons, always battling the idea that at 5 feet 9 inches he can’t defend against the league’s taller receivers.
snippet: Trumaine McBride has played for five teams in six N.F.L. seasons, always battling the idea that at 5 feet 9 inches he can’t defend against the league’s taller receivers.
